moe.zenbu.torrent.wrappers

Class UtorrentWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • moe.zenbu.torrent.wrappers.UtorrentWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientWrapper

    public class UtorrentWrapper
extends Object
implements ClientWrapper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UtorrentWrapper(String username, String password)
      Constructs a client wrapper for Deluge, uses default values for the url and port.
      UtorrentWrapper(String username, String password, String url, int port)
      Constructs a client wrapper for Utorrent, uses specified url and port.

        username - Username for the Utorrent web ui
        password - Password for the Utorrent web ui

      • UtorrentWrapper

        public UtorrentWrapper(String username,
                       String password,
                       String url,
                       int port)
        Constructs a client wrapper for Utorrent, uses specified url and port.
        Parameters:
        username - Password for the Utorrent web ui
        password - Password for the Utorrent web ui
        url - URL for the Utorrent web ui
        port - Port for the Utorrent web ui

      • addTorrent

        public void addTorrent(String url)
                throws WrapperConnectException,
                       WrapperUnauthorisedException
        Adds a torrent to download, downloads to the clients default directory.
        Specified by:
        addTorrent in interface ClientWrapper
        Parameters:
        url - URL to the torrent file
        Throws:
        WrapperConnectException - Error with connection to client
        WrapperUnauthorisedException - Unauthorised access to client

      • addTorrent

        public void addTorrent(String url,
                       String downloadPath)
                throws WrapperConnectException,
                       WrapperUnauthorisedException
        This is not supported by uTorrent API so the wrapper will throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        addTorrent in interface ClientWrapper
        Parameters:
        url - URL to the torrent file
        downloadPath - Canonical path to the desired download directory
        Throws:
        WrapperConnectException - Error with connection to client
        WrapperUnauthorisedException - Unauthorised access to client
        UnsupportedOperationException - Not supported by uTorrent API

      • removeTorrent

        public void removeTorrent(Torrent torrent,
                          boolean withData)
                   throws WrapperConnectException,
                          WrapperUnauthorisedException
        Removes the torrent from the client. The client will no longer continue to download the torrent.
        Specified by:
        removeTorrent in interface ClientWrapper
        Parameters:
        torrent - Torrent to remove
        withData - Remove downloaded data as well
        Throws:
        WrapperConnectException
        WrapperUnauthorisedException

                          throws WrapperConnectException,
                                 WrapperUnauthorisedException
        Get a list of all torrents managed by the client
        Specified by:
        getTorrents in interface ClientWrapper
        Returns:
        List of torrents, default implementation is BasicTorrent
